content: Pablo Casellas was charged with fatally shooting his wife, 46-year-old Carmen Paredes, at their home in a wealthy suburb of San Juan in June 2012 where they lived with their two children. She was sho… [+1179 chars]

author: John Hudson
title: Trump administration to end Iran deal waivers in a blow to Obama-era pact - The Washington Post
description: The decision follows an internal battle between Iran hawks and a more aggressive group of hard-liners inside the U.S. government.

author: Ashley Parker
title: For a numbers-obsessed Trump, there’s one he has tried to ignore: 100,000 dead
description: At the moment, the president has no major plans for commemorating the bleak milestone in the pandemic set to be crossed this week.

author: Tony Romm
title: Arizona sues Google for allegedly violating Android users' location privacy
description: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich sued Google on Wednesday, alleging the tech giant violated its users’ privacy by collecting information about their whereabouts even if they thought they had turned off such digital tracking.
content:
When consumers try to opt out of Googles collection of location data, the company is continuing to find misleading ways to obtain information and use it for profit," Brnovich said in an interview.
